content.p: This page provides information on non-registered statuses and in what situations this might be applicable. Its content is relevant to staff and students across all of the UK, China and Malaysia campuses. There are a number of policies and processes within the University that might result in a student not being registered with the University although a relationship with the University still exists and they are expected at some time to continue or complete their programme. This content is relevant to staff and students across all of the UK, China and Malaysia campuses Please note that students in the UK on a Student Route visa are also affected by the University's Policy on Immigration Sponsorship. Where academic policies and immigration policies seem to be contradictory, immigration policies will take precedence.
